#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	string a,b;
	int sum;
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a>>b;
	reverse(a.begin(),a.end());
	reverse(b.begin(),b.end());
	sum= atoi(a.c_str())+atoi(b.c_str());
	
	int x=0;
	while(sum>0)
	{
		x=10*x+sum%10;
		sum=sum/10;
	}
	cout<<x<<endl;
	
	}
}
